column4: I upgraded from Feisty to Gutsy and I'm regretting it. Gnome is messed up; it only runs in low-res ... I'm very glad I installed other window managers. How do I troubleshoot an upgrade that didn't do too well ?
for the resolution thing, have you tried to reconfig xserver-xorg or manually edit xorg.conf ?
dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg was not a good thing to do; the interface was messed up and it set peculiar values for keyboard and refresh rates etc.
